name: Diaphragm Breathing
description: Body continues to breathe with diaphragm by itself; breathing feels free from strain.

name: Body Relaxation
description: Physical relaxation deepens through slow, deliberate releasing with each exhale.

name: Mind Relaxation
description: Mental effort relaxes; frontal lobe area softens along with eyelids.

name: Mindful Presence
description: Sustained body awareness with clarity; sleepiness and dullness do not arise.

name: Content Presence
description: Enjoyment and contentment with present experience; mind returns quickly from wandering.

name: Natural Breathing
description: Breathing occurs naturally without control; body breathes by itself.

name: Whole of Each Breath
description: Intimate awareness of the entire breathing cycle; mind stays with each breath.

name: Breath Sensations
description: Clear perception of elemental qualities within each breath; sharpened awareness.

name: One Point of Sensation
description: Increased clarity of sensations at a single point (e.g., tip of nose) with body awareness in background.

name: Sustained Attention
description: Effortless, stable attention on the meditation object; subtle wandering ceases.

name: Whole-Body Breathing
description: Awareness of breathing throughout the entire body; sensory fields begin to fade.

name: Sustained Awareness
description: Awareness sustains itself; intimacy with pleasantness of whole-body breathing withdraws energy from craving.

name: Access Concentration
description: Deep letting go; all anticipation and fear drop away; threshold of jhana.
